thread.title: Sula Sessions to debut in New Delhi
thread.title_full: Sula Sessions to debut in New Delhi | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Sula Sessions to debut in New Delhi
text:
Other Articles Selena Gomez does not rule out getting back with Justin Bieber Malay describes Zyan Malik as 'pure genius' This new girl in town is giving serious competition to Kendall Jenner Sula Vineyards, wine producers is all set to introduce Sula Sessions in New Delhi on September 20, 2015. The event will be organised in association with Asahi, Japan’s First Dry Beer, imported to India by Sula Selections – the import arm of Sula Vineyards. After a successful launch in Pune in June 2015 and Bengaluru last month with an astounding turnout the event now enters the capital with Vasundhara Vidalur, a funk, jazz, RnB Soul artist. It’s a musical extravaganza at Sula Sessions, Delhi with a performance by Vasundhara Vee. The sessions are exclusively curated by Ryan Sadri and his team at New Clear Ideas.
Vasundhara Vidalur has been an active contributor to the movement that brought back RnB,Soul and Jazz into clubs, popular radio stations and young people’s playlists in India. Her sound and her story have been showcased on the documentary series The Dewarists on Star World, on Sound Trek on Fox Traveller and many others.
 15, 2015 6:21 pm
